bill_title: Honoring the 1999 Yankton Bucks High School football team, coaches, and staff involved in the football program.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 1999 Yankton Bucks High School football team, coaches, and staff involved in the football program. WHEREAS, the 1999 Yankton Bucks High School football team won the 11-AA State High School Football Championship with a 12-1 record through outstanding character, dedication, and perseverance; and WHEREAS, head coach Arlan Likness and his staff provided excellent leadership and superior wisdom to the members of the team; and WHEREAS, the students of the 1999 Yankton Bucks football team showed enormous school pride and great leadership on and off the field: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, the 1999 Yankton Bucks High School football team be recognized for their excellence in athletics for the 1999-2000 school year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 1999 Yankton Bucks High School football team, coaches, and staff involved in the football program. WHEREAS, the 1999 Yankton Bucks High School football team won the 11-AA State High School Football Championship with a 12-1 record through outstanding character, dedication, and perseverance; and WHEREAS, head coach Arlan Likness and his staff provided excellent leadership and superior wisdom to the members of the team; and WHEREAS, the students of the 1999 Yankton Bucks football team showed enormous school pride and great leadership on and off the field: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, the 1999 Yankton Bucks High School football team be recognized for their excellence in athletics for the 1999-2000 school year.
